Hi!,

I need to keep a default accent color i.e. charcoal whenever the ModernUI.Light.xaml theme will be selected such as snowflakes theme for e.g. uses blue color as its accent color but its a resource dictionary and how can I set the default accent color for light theme & I think it needs to be done in ModernUI project code, could anyone help me out

Thanks in advance,
Abdul Mateen.

Define the default accent color like so in your App.xaml. By defining the resource in your App.xaml, you will override the default setting in ModernUI.xaml
<Color x:Key="AccentColor">#e51400</Color>
